name: Bubble Chain Reactions
description:
Want to Play with Bubbles? Can you connect and explode with hours of fun in this highly addictive strategy puzzle game?

While fast pasted and relaxing at the same time, come play the multiple levels this match of dots fun game.

The simple game play is easy to follow. it's fun for all ages.

"Best Game for the connecting dots". Can you connect the dots within limited time?

"Bubble Chain Reaction Puzzle Game" is a super fun and challenging game where you have to play with several moving dots.

Bubble Chain Reaction Puzzle Game is Unlimited FUN!

Come play right now! It's amazing and really great fun!

Super easy to play this game! Different colors ball will be moving in the screen, you have to match the two same color dots together to win!

Exciting Game Features:

- Super fun and excitement
- HD graphics
- Super easy to play
- Social sharing options
- Fully free
- Exciting audio
